about_the_game:
Easily play tabletop games like D&D with your friends online. GATE was built with simplicity in mind, allowing people to play games with friendly quickly and easily. In the demo, you are restricted from hosting public games, however you can freely join games hosted by your friends. Additionally, you are unable to utilize the Steam Workshop.

Features

  • A server browser allowing you to join games with ease.
  • Synchronized drawings let you draw out your session on the fly.
  • Easy to use dice roller, with the ability to support complex rolls.
  • In-game chat in the case that voice chat isn't available.

GATE Demo Includes

  • Several pieces of token art, to test the functionality.
  • SRD content for D&D 5th edition spells and monsters.

name: GATE Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Runs on just about anything
